document_data.name: Julia Ravensblood
document_data.History: Julia was a research [[wizard]] in [[Murann]]. While she was researching a ''[[sleep]]'' [[spell]], her lover [[Allon]] traveled to [[Maztica]]. Julia decided to meet him in [[Helmsport]], but discovered that he had died at the hands of some [[Viperhands|Viperhand]] monsters. Julia wanted to explore this new world and study [[Hishna]] and [[Pluma]] magic, and hoped to kill some Viperhand monsters as well.
document_data.Personality: Julia decided to remain in Maztica in order to avenge the death of her lover. However, she became fascinated by all of the new magic she discovered. She understood that she was one of the few wizards on the entire continent.
